- Topic: Amendment of Comprehensive Zoning Ordinance
- Summary: The ordinance aims to make changes to the Comprehensive Zoning Ordinance of the City of New Orleans, specifically related to the definition of "tattoo parlor" and the inclusion of tattoo parlors under the definition of "personal service establishment."
